name: Battleground - The Election Game (FREE)
description:
Willing to do anything to see Republicans take the White House?
Want to keep the Democrats in power?

Manage the election campaign for your favourite presidential candidate, be it Democrat or Republican and help him or her win the White House in 2016.

Battleground - The Election Game is a fun game for family and friends where you take on the role of your favourite candidate's campaign manager.

Battleground is perfect for political junkies, die-hard Democrats, and rabid Republicans alike. It is also great fun for parents and kids looking to learn more about the Presidential electoral process.

Features:
・ Pick your favourite candidate
・Plan your campaign, fundraise, avoid the headlines and launch attack ads
・Play against your friends via Game Center
・Simple yet addictively fun gameplay
・Make to the top of the Campaign Manager Hall of Fame - Leaderboards

Gameplay:
・ Play the role of the presidential candidate's campaign manager
・ Strategically plan out the itinerary for each week before the elections
・ Campaign in tossup and leaning states to win them over while keeping an eye on your funds and fundraise when needed
・ Get as many states moved in your favor before the Election Day and win the race to the White House

Candidate avatars illustrations inspired by caricature artist Donkeyhotey
